fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Dangerous: You have a hand size of 6 and draw 1 more card every phase. 
- Mask: Choose a role to disguise as within the first phase of the game. You will appear to win with others according to the role you chose.
- Tough Skin: You are immune to Chaos faction’s Night phase attack.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Curios: Gain a non-duel won card of your choice. [3 uses, 1 CD] 
- Trick: All of your attacking cards in this phase will appear to come from different players. [2 uses, 1 CD]  
- Illusion: Choose a host message to send to the action log or a player’s private channel. The message will not actually do anything, but players may interact with it as if it were real. [4 uses, 1 CD, Astral] 
- Time Skip: Skip the next phase. [1 use, Unique]
- Fake Death: Select a non-King player to “die” in the next phase. They will not actually die, and come back to the game in 2 phases. However, if the game would normally end as if they were actually dead, the game ends when they are “dead”. [1 use, Unique, Locks D5]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank/Outsider King.
